children.title: Day/month of visit
children.description: Visit date information available in both restricted and public use files
children.details: Enables temporal analysis of visit patterns and seasonal trends

children.title: Time of visit
children.description: Specific visit time - restricted file only
children.details: Precise timing data for detailed workflow and capacity analysis

children.title: Patient's age
children.description: Age information in both file types
children.details: Critical for age-stratified health outcomes research

children.title: Patient's sex
children.description: Biological sex in both file types

children.title: Patient's race/ethnicity
children.description: Race and ethnicity data in both file types
children.details: Enables health equity and disparity research

children.title: Patient's marital status
children.description: Marital status in both file types

children.title: Diagnoses (ICD-10-CM)
children.description: Diagnostic codes in both file types (30+ variables)
children.details: Standardized disease classification for comprehensive health research

children.title: Medical procedures
children.details: Detailed procedural data for treatment pattern analysis

children.title: Laboratory tests
children.description: Lab test orders and results - restricted file only
children.details: Laboratory data for clinical outcomes research

children.title: Biometric/vitals
children.description: Vital signs and measurements - restricted file only
children.details: Blood pressure, BMI, temperature for health monitoring

children.title: Medication
children.details: Pharmaceutical treatment data for medication research

children.title: Medication status
children.description: Medication continuation status - restricted file only

children.title: Survey stratum
children.description: Sampling stratum in both file types
children.details: Enables proper variance estimation in analysis

children.title: Survey weight
children.description: Sample weights in both file types
